protocol.name: P-GSE3454-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)
DETECTION P-VALUE = 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE3454-2
protocol.text: Approximately 100 mg of 7-day old seedlings were frozen and ground in liquid nitrogen. Total RNA was extracted using an TRIzol kit (Invitrogen) and purified by RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE3454-3
protocol.text: Approximately 10 Âµg of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
